Package org.wildfly.security.x500.cert.acme

Class AcmeAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wildfly.security.x500.cert.acme.AcmeAccount
  • public final class AcmeAccount
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represents an Automatic Certificate Management Environment (ACME) account.
    Since:
    1.5.0
    Author:
    Farah Juma
